projects.title: BANKING CORE SYSTEM
projects.brief: A unified core banking platform serving 120+ branches and 4M+ customers. This initiative aimed to replace a fragmented legacy system ecosystem (15+ separate AS/400 modules) with a single, scalable, microservices-based architecture capable of real-time transaction settlement and multi-channel integration.
projects.strategy: Conducted exhaustive 'As-Is' vs 'To-Be' gap analysis across 450+ unique business processes. Implemented a phased migration strategy using the Strangler Fig pattern to minimize operational risk.
projects.technical: Orchestrated a distributed system using Spring Boot and Apache Kafka for event-driven transactions. Designed a unified data schema to support real-time reporting and cross-platform sync.

projects.title: PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS
projects.brief: An enterprise-grade predictive analytics platform designed to forecast financial trends and automate risk assessment workflows. Built for CFO and treasury teams to support strategic planning.
projects.strategy: Defined 80+ KPIs with C-level stakeholders. Integrated disparate data sources (ERP, CRM, market feeds) into a centralized data warehouse for real-time analytics.
projects.technical: Utilized Python-based ML models (scikit-learn, XGBoost) orchestrated via Apache Airflow. Frontend dashboard built with React and D3.js for interactive visualizations.

outcomes.label: Forecast Accuracy
outcomes.desc: Achieved 92% accuracy in quarterly revenue forecasting.

outcomes.label: Insight Gap
outcomes.desc: Reduced time from data collection to actionable insight.

projects.title: SECURITY PROTOCOL X
projects.brief: Zero-trust identity and access management (IAM) framework for hybrid cloud environments. Designed to secure microservices communication and enforce least-privilege principles across 200+ services.
projects.strategy: Mapped all service-to-service interactions and defined granular access policies. Collaborated with security team to ensure compliance with ISO 27001 and SOC 2 standards.
projects.technical: Implemented OAuth 2.0 + OpenID Connect flows with custom policy engine. Used HashiCorp Vault for secrets management and Istio service mesh for mTLS enforcement.

outcomes.label: Compliance Score
outcomes.desc: Full compliance with ISO 27001 and SOC 2.
